channel.title: How to make a shop in 508?
channel.description:
Hello, i have been useing 317 servers but, now its time for update :), so i found a 508 server. & i wants to make a shop but i don't know how can some one make me a mini TUT?
And How to add npc's :)
I have look in TUT section.
